初遇.encontent:
The lake is overflowing. It's cold, just like a flowing
 line ... Wait, where am I?
初遇.content:
湖水漫起来了，冰凉，就像流动的线一样……不对、这里
是哪儿？

箱中气候.encontent:
Horizon ... the boundary of heaven and earth that may or may
 not intersect with the earth's surface,useful to measure the
 radio waves, and useful to ... make people feel better.
箱中气候.content:
地平线——与地表相交或不相交的天地分界线。有助于测
算电波距离，也有助于……让人心情变好。

致未来.encontent:
I hope that in the future I can also contribute to
 the well-being of mankind ... However, it would be
 better to have more missions.
致未来.content:
希望未来我也能为人类的福祉献上一份力……不过，再多
一些外派任务就更好了……

孑立.encontent:
Timekeeper ... Timekeeper? ... Are you asleep?Okay,
 please have a good rest. Where is the blanket? ...
 Mmm, cover yourself and you won't catch a cold.
孑立.content:
司辰——司辰？……您睡着了吗？好的，请好好休息吧，毯
子放在哪里了？……唔，盖上就不会着凉了。

问候.encontent:
Greetings! Today your shirt matches the color of your
 eyes very well.
问候.content: 您好！今天的衬衫与您的眼睛颜色很相称。

朝晨.encontent:
Good morning! Here's the newspaper today.Huh? Why are
 my fingers black ... stained with ink?How come? I've
 just touched it ...
朝晨.content:
早上好！这是今天的报纸。咦？我的手指怎么变黑了……沾
了油墨？怎么会？我只是摸了一下……

信任-朝晨.encontent:
Good morning! Today I read a news story on the Italian
 Cheek Kissing Greeting ... Uh, I mean, it would be
 great if we can practice it.
信任-朝晨.content:
早上好！我今天看到了关于意大利贴面礼的报道……呃、我
的意思是说，如果能实践一下也不错。

夜暮.encontent:
These newspapers ... plea ... please do not throw them
 away until I finish reading!
夜暮.content: 这些报纸……等我全部看完再一起丢掉吧……

信任-夜暮.encontent:
Is it really ok doing nothing like this?Ha ... I mean when I
 was at the Foundation, there had never been such a tranquil
 night ... Thank you for teaching me all these things.
信任-夜暮.content:
这样无所事事真的可以吗？在基金会的时候，从来都没有
如此闲寂的夜晚……谢谢您教会我这一切。

帽檐与发鬓.encontent:
Order is more important than opinion ... I was taught
 in this way.
帽檐与发鬓.content: 命令大于思考。……过去我是被这样教导的。

袖与手.encontent:
It is said that the world I write down is just my imagination
 ... But how can I get closer to the reality? What
 is ... the boundary between them?
袖与手.content:
他们说，笔下的世界不过是我的想象……可如何才能更接
近真实？想象与真实的边界，究竟是什么呢？

衣着与身形.encontent:
The Foundation has provided me with much help, including
 food, uniforms, education ... and goals.
衣着与身形.content:
基金会为我提供了很多帮助，有食物、制服、教育……还
有目标。

嗜好.encontent:
The joke on November 7th ... I seem to have read it
 somewhere? Ah! It was on the issue of February 29th!
 ... Report! I found a typographical error!
嗜好.content:
11月7日这则笑话我怎么好像在哪儿见过？啊！是2月
29日那期！——报告司辰！我发现了一个印刷错误！

赞赏.content:
情绪稳定有担当，计划周密动手强，温柔果断还好看……嗯
？怎么了吗？司辰？您为什么要捂着脸呢？

亲昵.encontent:
... Here's the newspaper from yesterday. The bridge,
 can we go there? It looks really beautiful!
亲昵.content:
……这是昨天的报纸。上面这座大桥，我们也可以去吗？它
看起来真的很漂亮！

闲谈Ⅰ.encontent:
Did you do something amazing just now?Well, you don't
 need to explain to me. I can imagine it.
闲谈Ⅰ.content:
您刚刚是去做了什么了不起的事情吧？嗯，不用跟我详细
说明，我能够想象得到的。

闲谈Ⅱ.encontent:
The verses to release arcane skills are not easy to find. They
 must be full of passion and well-timed, and can only be found
 with luck.However, if I know a poet, maybe ... things will be
 much easier.
闲谈Ⅱ.content:
能够用于释放神秘术的诗句并不好找。它们必须情绪饱满
、时机恰当，可遇不可求。不过，如果我能认识一个诗人
，或许……一切就简单多了。

独白.encontent:
Sometimes I think about the time ... when we studied together
 ... The instructor made us deskmates,and your pockets are always
 alive with frogs, stones and toffees.
独白.content:
我有时候会回想起过去，我们一起学习的时光……教员让
我们成为了同桌。你的口袋里总是塞满了青蛙、石子和太
妃糖。

入队.encontent: Just as what's been practiced countless times.
入队.content: 就像平时无数次的练习那样。

战前.encontent: May the peace be with us.

择选高阶咒语.encontent: You've found the right verse for me.
择选高阶咒语.content: 您为我找到了适合的诗句。

择选至终的仪式.encontent: Depict the world I have never seen before.
择选至终的仪式.content: 描摹我未曾见过的世界。

释放神秘术Ⅰ.content: 晴朗和静谧统治着一切

释放神秘术Ⅱ.encontent: So long lives this, and this gives power to thee.
释放神秘术Ⅱ.content: 这长存之诗，予你以生命。

战斗胜利.encontent: I will pray for you ... sorry.
战斗胜利.content: 我会为你们祈祷的……抱歉。

洞悉.encontent: Hu ... la ringrazio. I will make good use of this power.
洞悉.content: 呼……感谢您。我会好好运用这份力量的。

洞悉之底.encontent:
This place has brought me so many things: freedom,
 fresh knowledge, brave friends.How can I ever repay
 you?I want to be of help to you at any time.
洞悉之底.content:
这里已经带给了我太多东西了……自由、新奇的一切、勇
敢的朋友。我又该如何报答你呢？我想在任何时候都能成
为你的助力。
